greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Compound filter (phi(n) & 2-adic valuation of sigma(n)): a(n) = P(A000010(n), A286357(n)), where P(n,k) is sequence A000027 used as a pairing function.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
program: from sympy import divisor_sigma as D, totient
def T(n, m): return ((n + m)**2 - n - 3*m + 2)/2
def a(n): return T(totient(n), a286357(n)) # _Indranil Ghosh_, May 26 2017
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, May 26 2017
